src:
Jejak Dewi Tanjung Pelapor Novel, Pernah Adukan Amien Rais hingga HRS
07 Nov 2019, 12:34 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Dewi Ambarwati alias Dewi Tanjung jadi sorotan setelah melaporkan penyidik KPK Novel Baswedan ke Polda Metro Jaya. Kader PDIP ini menuduh aksi penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel sebagai rekayasa. Dewi sendiri dikenal memang kerap melaporkan seseorang ke polisi.
Sebagaimana diketahui, Dewi membuat laporan terhadap Novel ke Polda Metro Jaya. Laporan itu terkait dugaan rekayasa penyiraman air keras.
"Saya melaporkan Novel Baswedan penyidik KPK terkait dugaan rekayasa kasus penyiraman air keras," kata Dewi kepada wartawan di Polda Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Dewi menduga ada kejanggalan atas kebutaan yang dialami oleh Novel atas insiden penyiraman air keras. Dia mempertanyakan bentuk luka hingga mata Novel yang buta.
"Ada beberapa hal yang janggal dari semua hal yang dialami dari rekaman CCTV dia dari bentuk luka, dari perban, kepala yang diperban tapi tiba-tiba mata yang buta gitu kan," sambungnya.
Dewi mulanya dikenal sebagai pemain sinetron. Dia pernah berakting dalam sinetron berjudul 'Tangis Kehidupan Wanita'.
text:
Trace of Dewi Tanjung Reporting Novel, Ever Reported Amien Rais to HRS
Nov 7 2019, 12:34 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Dewi Ambarwati alias Dewi Tanjung is in the spotlight after reporting the investigator of the KPK Novel Baswedan to the Jakarta Police. The PDI-P cadre accused the watering action of hard water against Novels as fabricated. Dewi herself is known to often report someone to the police.
As is known, Dewi made a report on the novel to the Jakarta Police. The report was related to allegations of engineering hard watering.
"I report the Baswedan KPK investigator related to the alleged engineering of a case of hard water sprinkling," Dewi told reporters at the Jakarta Metropolitan Police, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Dewi suspects that there are irregularities in the blindness experienced by the Novel for the incidents of hard watering. He questioned the shape of the wound until Novel's eyes were blind.
"There are some strange things from all the things he experienced from CCTV footage from the form of wounds, from bandages, bandaged heads, but suddenly blind eyes, right," he continued.
Dewi was originally known as a soap opera player. He once acted in a soap opera titled 'The Cry of Women's Life'.
